queries.sql: SELECT rtb.* FROM requests_tbl rtb WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT id FROM request_donors_tbl rdtb WHERE rdtb.request_id = rtb.id AND rdtb.donor_id = 5 AND rdtb.donor_type = 'blood-bank' AND deleted_at IS NULL ) AND deleted_at IS NULL AND rtb.id = 20 ORDER BY rtb.created_at DESC
